movies.title: The Copper Tower
movies.plot: A dramatic story of three friends happily spending time on their own in a mountain cottage in the High Tatras. On the arrival of the wife of one of them their perfect friendship is put to a test.
movies.simplePlot: A dramatic story of three friends happily spending time on their own in a mountain cottage in the High Tatras. On the arrival of the wife of one of them their perfect friendship is put to a test.

biography.placeOfBirth: Horná Stubna, First Slovak Republic [now Slovakia]
biography.bio: Emília Vásáryová was born on May 18, 1942 in Horná Stubna, First Slovak Republic as Emilia Vasáryová. She is an actress, known for Up and Down (2004), Václav (2007) and Cosy Dens (1999).
biography.name: Emília Vásáryová

biography.bio: Ivan Rajniak was born on July 10, 1931 in Hybe, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for The Copper Tower (1970), Daleko je do neba (1974) and Orlie pierko (1972). He died on February 23, 1999.
biography.name: Ivan Rajniak

biography.bio: Ivan Mistrík was born on October 15, 1935 in Bratislava, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for Roméo, Juliette et les ténèbres (1960), Higher Principle (1960) and Orlie pierko (1972). He died on June 8, 1982 in Bratislava.
biography.name: Ivan Mistrík

biography.bio: Stefan Kvietik was born on May 10, 1934 in Dolné Plachtince, Czechoslovakia. He is an actor, known for The Boxer and Death (1963), The Millennial Bee (1983) and Entanglement (1977).
biography.name: Stefan Kvietik

biography.bio: Michal Docolomanský was born on March 25, 1942 in Niedzica, Malopolskie, Poland. He was an actor, known for Dinner for Adele (1978), The Mysterious Castle in the Carpathians (1981) and The Millennial Bee (1983). He was married to Marta Docolomanska. He died on August 26, 2008 in Bratislava, Slovakia.
biography.name: Michal Docolomanský

biography.bio: Vlado Müller was born on March 19, 1936 in Bratislava, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for The Medal (1980), Obzalovany (1964) and Master Executioner (1966). He died on June 20, 1996 in Slovakia.
biography.name: Vlado Müller

biography.bio: Slavo Drozd was born on March 21, 1931 in Vrútky, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for The Copper Tower (1970), Orlie pierko (1972) and Akcia Edelstein (1986). He died on July 13, 2008 in Bratislava, Slovakia.
biography.name: Slavo Drozd

biography.bio: Alena Skokanová is an actress, known for The Copper Tower (1970).
biography.name: Alena Skokanová

biography.bio: Július Vasek was born on December 29, 1926 in Nové Zámky, Czechoslovakia. He was an actor, known for And Give My Love to the Swallows (1972), Tam za lesem (1962) and Brothers (1962). He died on May 1, 2009 in Bratislava, Slovakia.
biography.name: Július Vasek
